remarks: Property deduction for a complete metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cmspropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
cmspropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
cmspropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( B X. B ) ) = ( ( dist ` L ) |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
cmspropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` L ) ) $.
cmspropd $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. CMetSp <-> L e. CMetSp ) ) $.
